description.zh-cn: 爱新觉罗宗室，清末立宪派大臣、宗社党首领，积极推动清末军事改革。辛亥革命期间，因组织宗社党反对清帝逊位，被同盟会成员彭家珍刺杀身亡。
description.en: An Aisin-Gioro clan member, a constitutionalist minister and leader of the Royalist Party in the late Qing Dynasty, who actively promoted military reforms. During the Xinhai Revolution, he was assassinated by Peng Jiazhen, a member of the Tongmenghui, for organizing the Royalist Party to oppose the abdication of the Qing emperor.

description.zh-cn: 同盟会京津分会成员，辛亥革命期间以自杀式袭击刺杀了宗社党首领良弼。
description.en: A member of the Beijing-Tianjin branch of the Tongmenghui, who assassinated Liangbi, the leader of the Royalist Party, in a suicide attack during the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国同盟会在北京和天津的分支机构，策划并执行了对良弼的刺杀行动。
description.en: The Beijing and Tianjin branch of the Tongmenghui, which planned and executed the assassination of Liangbi.

description.zh-cn: 由清末宗室溥伟、良弼等人组织的政治团体，主张君主立宪，反对清帝逊位。
description.en: A political group organized by late Qing imperial clan members such as Puwei and Liangbi, advocating for constitutional monarchy and opposing the abdication of the Qing emperor.

description.zh-cn: 推翻清朝、建立中华民国的全国性革命。
description.en: A nationwide revolution that overthrew the Qing dynasty and established the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 日本培养陆军军官的教育机构，良弼曾在此留学。
description.en: An educational institution in Japan for training army officers, where Liangbi studied.

description.zh-cn: 日本的一所学校，良弼曾在此学习，之后进入日本陆军士官学校。
description.en: A school in Japan where Liangbi studied before entering the Imperial Japanese Army Academy.

description.zh-cn: 清末重臣，洋务派代表人物。良弼曾投其门下。
description.en: An influential official in the late Qing dynasty and a representative of the Self-Strengthening Movement. Liangbi was his protégé.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初重要政治人物，中华民国第一任正式大总统。
description.en: An important political figure in the late Qing dynasty and early Republic of China, and the first formal president of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 清末宗室，与良弼等人共同组织宗社党。
description.en: A member of the imperial clan in the late Qing dynasty who co-founded the Royalist Party with Liangbi and others.

description.zh-cn: 清末大臣，与良弼等人共同组织宗社党，并称为“清季干将”。
description.en: A minister in the late Qing dynasty who co-founded the Royalist Party with Liangbi and others, and was known as a capable general of the late Qing period.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命期间，南方革命政府与北方清政府之间的停战谈判。
description.en: The truce negotiations between the southern revolutionary government and the northern Qing government during the Xinhai Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 清朝最后一位皇帝溥仪颁布退位诏书，标志着清朝统治的结束。
description.en: The last emperor of the Qing Dynasty, Puyi, issued an abdication edict, marking the end of Qing rule.

description.zh-cn: 清末军事将领，良弼在日本留学期间的莫逆之交。
description.en: A military general in the late Qing dynasty and a very close friend of Liangbi from their time studying in Japan.

description.zh-cn: 清末为拱卫京师而建立的新式军队。
description.en: A modern-style army established in the late Qing dynasty to guard the capital.

description.zh-cn: 清末仿照日本参谋本部设立的最高军事统筹机构。
description.en: The supreme military planning body established in the late Qing Dynasty, modeled after the Japanese General Staff Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 清末宗室，曾任军谘大臣、禁卫军训练大臣。
description.en: A member of the imperial clan in the late Qing Dynasty who served as Minister of the Army Advisory Council and Training Minister of the Imperial Guards.

description.zh-cn: 良弼之父。
description.en: Father of Liangbi.

description.zh-cn: 良弼之母。
description.en: Mother of Liangbi.

description.zh-cn: 清代四川省的行政区划之一，良弼的出生地。
description.en: An administrative division of Sichuan Province during the Qing Dynasty, and the birthplace of Liangbi.

description.zh-cn: 清末要求清政府实行君主立宪的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the late Qing dynasty demanding the implementation of a constitutional monarchy.

description.zh-cn: 孙中山于1894年创立的中国第一个资产阶级革命团体，同盟会的前身之一。
description.en: The first bourgeois revolutionary group in China, founded by Sun Yat-sen in 1894, and a predecessor of the Tongmenghui.

description.zh-cn: 清末大臣，曾任两江总督，对良弼评价甚高并予以推荐。
description.en: A minister in the late Qing dynasty who served as the Viceroy of Liangjiang. He held Liangbi in high regard and recommended him.

description.zh-cn: 日本驻清朝公使，曾授予良弼三等旭日勋章。
description.en: Japanese Minister to the Qing dynasty who awarded Liangbi the Order of the Rising Sun, 3rd Class.

description.zh-cn: 彭家珍在良弼家门口向其投掷炸弹，将其刺杀。
description.en: Peng Jiazhen threw a bomb at Liangbi at his doorstep, assassinating him.

description.zh-cn: 彭家珍是同盟会京津分会成员，并执行了刺杀良弼的任务。
description.en: Peng Jiazhen was a member of the Beijing-Tianjin branch of the Tongmenghui and carried out the mission to assassinate Liangbi.

description.zh-cn: 派遣成员彭家珍刺杀了被视为满族保皇派代表人物的良弼。
description.en: Dispatched member Peng Jiazhen to assassinate Liangbi, who was considered a representative figure of the Manchu royalists.

description.zh-cn: 良弼与溥伟、铁良等人共同组织了宗社党，以反对南北议和与清帝逊位。
description.en: Liangbi, along with Puwei and Tieliang, co-founded the Royalist Party to oppose the North-South peace negotiations and the abdication of the Qing emperor.

description.zh-cn: 溥伟与良弼、铁良等人共同组织了宗社党。
description.en: Puwei co-founded the Royalist Party with Liangbi and Tieliang.

description.zh-cn: 铁良与溥伟、良弼等人共同组织了宗社党。
description.en: Tieliang co-founded the Royalist Party with Puwei and Liangbi.

description.zh-cn: 良弼反对革命，主张“以立宪弥革命”，并组织宗社党反对南北议和与清帝逊位。
description.en: Liangbi opposed the revolution, advocating to 'use constitutionalism to quell revolution,' and organized the Royalist Party to oppose the North-South peace negotiations and the abdication of the Qing emperor.

description.zh-cn: 良弼组织宗社党，明确表示反对南北议和。
description.en: Liangbi organized the Royalist Party and explicitly opposed the North-South peace negotiations.

description.zh-cn: 良弼组织宗社党，明确表示反对清帝逊位。
description.en: Liangbi organized the Royalist Party and explicitly opposed the abdication of the Qing emperor.

description.zh-cn: 良弼于1899年留学日本，首先进入成城学校学习。
description.en: Liangbi went to study in Japan in 1899, first enrolling in the Seijo School.

description.zh-cn: 良弼前往湖北，拜于时任湖广总督张之洞门下，成为其门生。
description.en: Liangbi traveled to Hubei and became a protégé of Zhang Zhidong, who was then the Viceroy of Huguang.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯延揽良弼担任其麾下陆军第二镇的陆军第八标统带官。
description.en: Yuan Shikai recruited Liangbi to serve as the commander of the 8th Army Regiment within the 2nd Army Division under his command.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯出任内阁总理大臣后，调冯国璋任禁卫军统制，夺去了良弼对禁卫军的实际控制权。
description.en: After becoming Prime Minister of the Imperial Cabinet, Yuan Shikai appointed Feng Guozhang as the commander of the Imperial Guards, thereby stripping Liangbi of his actual control over the unit.

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义后，良弼反对起用袁世凯。
description.en: After the Wuchang Uprising, Liangbi opposed the appointment of Yuan Shikai.

description.zh-cn: 两人在日本留学期间结识，成为一生的莫逆之交。
description.en: The two met while studying in Japan and became lifelong close friends.

description.zh-cn: 与铁良等人共同组织宗社党，并被称为清季干将。
description.en: Co-founded the Royalist Party with Tieliang and others, and they were known as capable generals of the late Qing period.

position.zh-cn: 第一协统领, 训练大臣
position.en: Commander of the 1st Brigade, Training Minister

description.zh-cn: 1908年底禁卫军成立，良弼授禁卫军第一协统领，实际负责管理；1910年10月升为禁卫军训练大臣。
description.en: When the Imperial Guards were established at the end of 1908, Liangbi was appointed Commander of the 1st Brigade and was its de facto manager; in October 1910, he was promoted to Training Minister of the Imperial Guards.

description.zh-cn: 清廷采纳良弼等人的建议，设立了军谘府以统筹全国陆海军事宜。
description.en: The Qing court adopted the proposal of Liangbi and others to establish the Army Advisory Council to coordinate national army and navy affairs.

description.zh-cn: 军谘大臣载涛不谙军事，凡事皆以良弼为“谋主”（首席参谋）。
description.en: The Minister of the Army Advisory Council, Zaitao, was not well-versed in military affairs and relied on Liangbi as his 'chief strategist'.

description.zh-cn: 良弼是清末立宪派大臣，主张“以立宪弥革命”，并在遗折中叮嘱“尊重信条，实行宪政”。
description.en: Liangbi was a constitutionalist minister in the late Qing dynasty who advocated 'using constitutionalism to quell revolution' and urged in his last testament to 'respect the articles and implement constitutional government'.

description.zh-cn: 留学期间，革命派指其“专司侦察革命党”，显示了敌对关系。
description.en: During his studies abroad, revolutionaries accused him of 'specializing in spying on the revolutionary party,' indicating an adversarial relationship.

description.zh-cn: 时任两江总督的端方上奏称赞良弼“才猷敏练，学术精深”，并推荐其为武学顾问之选。
description.en: Duanfang, then Viceroy of Liangjiang, submitted a memorial praising Liangbi for his 'sharp talent and profound knowledge' and recommended him as a candidate for military advisor.

description.zh-cn: 日本驻清朝公使伊集院彦吉授予良弼三等旭日勋章。
description.en: The Japanese Minister to the Qing Dynasty, Ijūin Hikokichi, awarded Liangbi the Order of the Rising Sun, 3rd Class.
